name: Kitchen For One
description:
Kitchen For One is a full-motion-video jazz improv cooking simulator about windows, mice, and everyday monotony.

Statistics about played videos are collected anonymously. Your inputs are not collected, what you type in your kitchen stays entirely private. 

If you experience long loading times, please set your streaming quality accordingly at the start of the game.

Original videos are from Scaling Egocentric Vision: The EPIC-KITCHENS Dataset, published under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommerial 4.0 International License. Changes by us include processing of the videos (codec, sobel filter).

The jazz was generated with Musenet.

Also we used a clip from Michael Snow's film Solar Breath.
